main event: On 7 Oct 1951, a bright bluish-white flash was observed in the North Atlantic Ocean at approximately 25,000 feet.
interesting points: The flash illuminated about 3/4 of the horizon for 1-2 seconds,No object was visually seen, and no sound was heard during the event,Speculation arose about the flash possibly being an unusual aircraft, but no definitive conclusions were reached,The phenomenon may have been associated with unusual atmospheric conditions,The sighting was part of a larger investigation by Project Blue Book.
witness description: Mr. Holland described a strange flying saucer in his letter.
